ingredients.item: 500g pack essential Waitrose British Pork Mince

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the pork and onion for 4-5 minutes to brown. Stir in the tomatoes, purée and stock, cover and cook for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, boil the pasta for 11 minutes or until tender, drain and toss in half the parsley. Add the remaining parsley to the pork and stir the pasta through the Bolognese. Serve in bowls.
